room_title: Escape room "Escape from The Old West" by The Crooked Key in Steamboat Springs
room_description:
The year is 1898. You have been apprehended for various crimes and are now being held at the Hahnâ€™s Peak jail just north of Steamboat Springs in Northwest Colorado. Harry Tracy and David Lant are two of the most infamous outlaws in the West. Tracy is even wanted for murder!
Some of you are in here on lesser charges, but are devious, surly types nonetheless. Try not wake sleeping Deputy Festus as you gather the evidence against you and attempt to blast out of jail in under 60 minutes. Sheriff Neiman will be back in one hour to transfer you to a more secure jail in Aspen. There is no time to waste!
